text.section: Twenty-five (25) or more persons domiciled in this state may organize a domestic reciprocal insurer and make application to the commissioner for a certificate of authority to transact insurance.
The declaration shall be acknowledged by the attorney in the manner required for the acknowledgment of deeds.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1374, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 27, sec. 6, effective June 18, 1970.
